Thanks for this link to Gatto's article. I loved it. I have many

messages.subject: Re: food for thought
messages.msgSnippet: Debra, Thanks for the link.  I checked it out.  Strange though, I think the original essay is entitled The Seven Lesson Schoolteacher.  This one has only six.
messages.messageBody:
Debra,

Thanks for the link. I checked it out. Strange though, I
think the original essay is entitled The Seven Lesson
Schoolteacher. This one has only six. I have his book
Dumbing Us Down and have been using it as a reference for
my own writing. I wonder if JTG changed it recently, and
if so for what reason. The first lesson about "Confusion"
has been left out. Anybody have any info??????????????

Betsy Wright

The Wright Way To Homeschool
www.angelfire.com/fl3/homeschoolingwrights
deejay@...
